name: YanDemonLin
description:
WARNING! This game might include stuff that may make you uncomfortable. So please, if you don't want to meet up with anything uncomfortable. you can skip playing that game. 

Welcome!
This is YanDemonLin (Yandere Demon Gremlin). It is a VN game where you Play as Diana. She can be a bit weird at times, but that is because she loves Fransismo. Who is he? He is her roommate in the dorm they are both in. In the game, you have a "LoveMeter". This LoveMeter belongs to Diana. Your goal is to try filling it to the max!

Enjoy playing! 

(This is my first full game and I am open for criticism. So sorry if it wasn't the best thing ever. 
- TheMime.)

Mac and Linux release coming soon!
Thanks for reading!
